mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Senator John Davison (Jay) Rockefeller IV Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Virginia Wesleyan College Legacy Memorandum
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The "West Virginia Wesleyan college Legacy Memorandum" provides a comprehensive overview of Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller's work as President of West Virginia Wesleyan College from 1973 to 1975, including his efforts to increase enrollment, create an active recruitment campaign, and streamline operations.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Education, HigherAdministration
Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
West Virginia Wesleyan College
memorandums
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller IV papers, West Virginia & Regional History Center, West Virginia University Libraries
